title: Gamification-Based Cognitive Skill Enhancement Program for Novice Programmers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Job enhancement training for current practitioners, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: By the end of learning, 80% or more of participants reduce logical puzzle-solving time by 30%.
Through gamification activities, reduce logical error rates in algorithm design by 50% within four weeks.
In formative assessments, 75% or more of learners demonstrate improvement in explaining problem-solving strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
